word_mean: 腹膜炎：以腹腔中有血浆、纤维蛋白、细胞和脓液渗出为特征的腹膜炎症
伴有腹痛、压痛、便秘、呕吐和中等度发热

sentence.Network_en: Pneumococcal peritonitis may occur as a complication in children with nephrosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 对肾病儿童来说肺炎球菌腹膜炎可作为并发症出现.

sentence.Network_en: Enteric anastomoses may disrupt and produce a fistula and peritonitis.
sentence.Network_cn: 小肠吻合可能破裂并产生瘘管和腹膜炎.

sentence.Network_en: Peritonitis is still a cause of dropout and hospitalization in PD patients.
sentence.Network_cn: 腹膜炎仍然是导致腹膜透析患者住院和退出的住院原因之一.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...管炎（salpingitis）、输卵管卵巢脓肿（tubo-ovarian abscess，TOA）、盆腔腹膜炎（peritonitis）。炎症可局限于一个部位，也可同时.

list.abs: 腹膜透析（peritoneal dialysis）（Peritoneal dialysis）是利用腹膜作为半渗透膜，利用重力作用将配制好的透析液经导管灌入患者的腹膜腔，这样，在腹膜 …

entry.def: Peritonitis is a disease in which the inside wall of your abdomen becomes swollen and very painful.
